xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 13 Parittattika » 13.7 Pañhāvāra » 13.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 13.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Parittattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
55.
2028Paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  parittā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2029Mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi. (Pavattipaṭisandhi kātabbā.)
2030Appamāṇo dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
<< 13.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Ārammaṇa >>
